name: My Quarantine Life
description:
WASD to move, mouse to look. Other buttons are prompted.

Red Bar = Health; When it drops to 0, it's Game Over.

Brown Bar = Hunger; When it drops to 0, you start to lose Health.

Blue Bar = Thirst; When it drops to 0, you start to lose Health.

Purple Bar = Sanity; As it drops, your vision distorts. Performing many actions such as playing or buying things help to replenish it, with diminishing returns for repeated actions.

Right now, the objective is to survive as long as possible, although a more defined goal will be developed.
